verses.verse: וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> now you בֶן־ <WH1121> Thou also son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man קַח־ <WH3947> take לְךָ֣ לְבֵנָ֔ה <WH3843> thee a tile וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> and lay אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> it before וְחַקּוֹתָ֥ <WH2710> thee and pourtray עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> and עִ֖יר <WH5892> upon it the city אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> [even] Jerusalem

וְנָתַתָּ֨ה <WH5414> And lay עָלֶ֜יהָ <WH5921> against מָצ֗וֹר <WH4692> siege וּבָנִ֤יתָ <WH1129> against it and build עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5921> against דָּיֵ֔ק <WH1785> a fort וְשָׁפַכְתָּ֥ <WH8210> against it and cast עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> against סֹֽלְלָ֑ה <WH5550> a mount וְנָתַתָּ֨ה <WH5414> against it set עָלֶ֧יהָ <WH5921> against מַחֲנ֛וֹת <WH4264> the camp וְשִׂים־ <WH7760> also against it and set עָלֶ֥יהָ <WH5921> against כָּרִ֖ים <WH3733> [battering] rams סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> against it round about

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you קַח־ <WH3947> Moreover take לְךָ֙ מַחֲבַ֣ת <WH4227> pan בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> thou unto thee an iron וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> and set אוֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> קִ֣יר <WH7023> it [for] a wall בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> of iron בֵּינְךָ֖ <WH996> between וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> between thee and the city וַהֲכִינֹתָה֩ <WH3559> and set אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנֶ֨יךָ <WH6440> thy face אֵלֶ֜יהָ <WH413> toward וְהָיְתָ֤ה <WH1961> is under בַמָּצוֹר֙ <WH4692> against it and it shall be besieged וְצַרְתָּ֣ <WH6696> and thou shalt lay siege עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> is a א֥וֹת <WH226> against it This [shall be] a sign הִ֖יא <WH1931> This לְבֵ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel ס

וְאַתָּ֤ה <WH859> you שְׁכַב֙ <WH7901> Lie עַל־ <WH5921> and צִדְּךָ֣ <WH6654> side הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔י <WH8042> thou also upon thy left וְשַׂמְתָּ֛ <WH7760> and lay אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> the iniquity בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עָלָ֑יו <WH5921> for מִסְפַּ֤ר <WH4557> upon it [according] to the number הַיָּמִים֙ <WH3117> of the days אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after תִּשְׁכַּ֣ב <WH7901> that thou shalt lie עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> on תִּשָּׂ֖א <WH5375> upon it thou shalt bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> their iniquity

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I נָתַ֤תִּֽי <WH5414> For I have laid לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8141> upon thee the years עֲוֹנָ֔ם <WH5771> of their iniquity לְמִסְפַּ֣ר <WH4557> according to the number יָמִ֔ים <WH3117> of the days שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְתִשְׁעִ֖ים <WH8673> and ninety י֑וֹם <WH3117> days וְנָשָׂ֖אתָ <WH5375> so shalt thou bear עֲוֹ֥ן <WH5771> the iniquity בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> of the house יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וְכִלִּיתָ֣ <WH3615> And when thou hast accomplished אֶת־ <WH853> אֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> them וְשָׁ֨כַבְתָּ֜ <WH7901> lie עַל־ <WH5921> and צִדְּךָ֤ <WH6654> side [הַיְמֹונִי כ] (הַיְמָנִי֙ <WH3227> right ק) שֵׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> again וְנָשָׂ֖אתָ <WH5375> and thou shalt bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty י֔וֹם <WH3117> days י֧וֹם <WH3117> A day לַשָּׁנָ֛ה <WH8141> year י֥וֹם <WH3117> days לַשָּׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> year נְתַתִּ֥יו <WH5414> I have appointed לָֽךְ׃

וְאֶל־ <WH413> toward מְצ֤וֹר <WH4692> toward the siege יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem תָּכִ֣ין <WH3559> Therefore thou shalt set פָּנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> thy face וּֽזְרֹעֲךָ֖ <WH2220> and thine arm חֲשׂוּפָ֑ה <WH2834> [shall be] uncovered וְנִבֵּאתָ֖ <WH5012> and thou shalt prophesy עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> now behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> And behold I will lay עָלֶ֖יךָ <WH5921> and עֲבוֹתִ֑ים <WH5688> bands וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> you cannot תֵהָפֵ֤ךְ <WH2015> upon thee and thou shalt not turn מִֽצִּדְּךָ֙ <WH6654> thee from one side אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדֶּ֔ךָ <WH6654> to another עַד־ <WH5704> until כַּלּוֹתְךָ֖ <WH3615> till thou hast ended יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> the days מְצוּרֶֽךָ׃ <WH4692> of thy siege

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you קַח־ <WH3947> Take לְךָ֡ חִטִּ֡ין <WH2406> thou also unto thee wheat וּ֠שְׂעֹרִים <WH8184> and barley וּפ֨וֹל <WH6321> and beans וַעֲדָשִׁ֜ים <WH5742> and lentiles וְדֹ֣חַן <WH1764> and millet וְכֻסְּמִ֗ים <WH3698> and fitches וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> and put אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> בִּכְלִ֣י <WH3627> vessel אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> them in one וְעָשִׂ֧יתָ <WH6213> and make אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> לְךָ֖ לְלָ֑חֶם <WH3899> thee bread מִסְפַּ֨ר <WH4557> thereof [according] to the number הַיָּמִ֜ים <WH3117> of the days אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH859> you שׁוֹכֵ֣ב <WH7901> that thou shalt lie עַֽל־ <WH5921> on צִדְּךָ֗ <WH6654> upon thy side שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> three מֵא֧וֹת <WH3967> hundred וְתִשְׁעִ֛ים <WH8673> and ninety י֖וֹם <WH3117> days תֹּאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH398> shalt thou eat

וּמַאֲכָֽלְךָ֙ <WH3978> And thy meat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תֹּאכֲלֶ֔נּוּ <WH398> which thou shalt eat בְּמִשְׁק֕וֹל <WH4946> [shall be] by weight עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> twenty שֶׁ֖קֶל <WH8255> shekels לַיּ֑וֹם <WH3117> a day מֵעֵ֥ת <WH6256> from time עַד־ <WH5704> against עֵ֖ת <WH6256> to time תֹּאכֲלֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH398> shalt thou eat

וּמַ֛יִם <WH4325> also water בִּמְשׂוּרָ֥ה <WH4884> by measure תִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH8354> Thou shalt drink שִׁשִּׁ֣ית <WH8345> the sixth part הַהִ֑ין <WH1969> of an hin מֵעֵ֥ת <WH6256> from time עַד־ <WH5704> against עֵ֖ת <WH6256> to time תִּשְׁתֶּֽה׃ <WH8354> shalt thou drink

וְעֻגַ֥ת <WH5692> cakes שְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> it [as] barley תֹּֽאכֲלֶ֑נָּה <WH398> And thou shalt eat וְהִ֗יא <WH1931> he בְּגֶֽלְלֵי֙ <WH1561> it with dung צֵאַ֣ת <WH6627> that cometh out הָֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man תְּעֻגֶ֖נָה <WH5746> and thou shalt bake לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in their sight ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD כָּ֣כָה <WH3602> Thus יֹאכְל֧וּ <WH398> eat בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Even thus shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> לַחְמָ֖ם <WH3899> bread טָמֵ֑א <WH2931> their defiled בַּגּוֹיִ֕ם <WH1471> among the Gentiles אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I אַדִּיחֵ֖ם <WH5080> whither I will drive שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וָאֹמַ֗ר <WH559> Then said אֲהָהּ֙ <WH162> I Ah אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> behold my soul לֹ֣א <WH3808> have never מְטֻמָּאָ֑ה <WH2930> hath not been polluted וּנְבֵלָ֨ה <WH5038> of that which dieth of itself וּטְרֵפָ֤ה <WH2966> or is torn in pieces לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have never אָכַ֙לְתִּי֙ <WH398> up even till now have I not eaten מִנְּעוּרַ֣י <WH5271> for from my youth וְעַד־ <WH5704> until עַ֔תָּה <WH6258> now וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor בָ֥א <WH935> neither came בְּפִ֖י <WH6310> into my mouth בְּשַׂ֥ר <WH1320> flesh פִּגּֽוּל׃ <WH6292> there abominable ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> to me רְאֵ֗ה <WH7200> unto me Lo נָתַ֤תִּֽי <WH5414> I have given לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <WH853> [צְפוּעֵי כ] (צְפִיעֵ֣י <WH6832> dung ק) הַבָּקָ֔ר <WH1241> thee cow's תַּ֖חַת <WH8478> place גֶּלְלֵ֣י <WH1561> dung הָֽאָדָ֑ם <WH120> for man's וְעָשִׂ֥יתָ <WH6213> and thou shalt prepare אֶֽת־ <WH853> לַחְמְךָ֖ <WH3899> thy bread עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Moreover he said אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me בֶּן־ <WH1121> unto me Son אָדָם֙ <WH120> of man הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> I am going שֹׁבֵ֤ר <WH7665> behold I will break מַטֵּה־ <WH4294> the staff לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> of bread בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְאָכְלוּ־ <WH398> and they shall eat לֶ֥חֶם <WH3899> bread בְּמִשְׁקָ֖ל <WH4948> by weight וּבִדְאָגָ֑ה <WH1674> and with care וּמַ֕יִם <WH4325> water בִּמְשׂוּרָ֥ה <WH4884> by measure וּבְשִׁמָּמ֖וֹן <WH8078> and with astonishment יִשְׁתּֽוּ׃ <WH8354> and they shall drink

לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> because יַחְסְר֖וּ <WH2637> That they may want לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> bread וָמָ֑יִם <WH4325> and water וְנָשַׁ֙מּוּ֙ <WH8074> and be astonied אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one וְאָחִ֔יו <WH251> with another וְנָמַ֖קּוּ <WH4743> and consume away בַּעֲוֹנָֽם׃ <WH5771> for their iniquity פ
